activate_template.label: Activate The Template
activate_template.comment: This will install all the CMS Pages and blocks and set the settings for the template

logo.label: Logo Image
logo.comment: Images wider than 200px will be resized

design_variation.label: Design Variation
design_variation.comment: Choose between light or dark design

responsive.label: Responsive Layout
responsive.comment: Enables or disables the responsive features of the layout.

show_subscribe.label: Show Subscribe To Newsletter
show_subscribe.comment: Disables the subscribe to newsletter form

list_categories_navigation.label: Category Sidebar Navigation
list_categories_navigation.comment: Enable list of all categories and subcategories on the sidebars

menutype.label: Menu Type
menutype.comment: MegaMenu is a wide style menu showing the subcategories in columns

mmenu_style.label: Mega Menu Style
mmenu_style.comment: HTML block or Thumbnal from the category options. Can also be overriden for each category separately. Check the category display options.

stickymenu.label: Sticky Menu
stickymenu.comment: If enabled the main menu will stick to the top of the page when scrolling

show_style_of_the_day.label: Show Style Of The Day Block
show_style_of_the_day.comment: Shows a grouped product block on the home page

style_of_the_day_title.label: Title
style_of_the_day_title.comment: Title for the style of the day block

style_of_the_day_cat_id.label: Category for style of the day
style_of_the_day_cat_id.comment: Put the category ID to which you want to limit the style of the day. Only grouped products will be shown.

show_new_products.label: Show New Products Slider
show_new_products.comment: Shows a new products slider on home page

new_products_title.label: Title
new_products_title.comment: Title for the new products slider

new_products_cat_id.label: Limit to single category
new_products_cat_id.comment: Put the category ID to which you want to limit the slider. No limit if empthy

show_sale_products.label: Show Sale Products Slider
show_sale_products.comment: Shows a sale products slider on home page

sale_products_title.label: Title
sale_products_title.comment: Title for the sale products slider

sale_products_cat_id.label: Limit to single category
sale_products_cat_id.comment: Put the category ID to which you want to limit the slider. No limit if empthy

show_brands.label: Show Brands Slider
show_brands.comment: Shows a brands slider on home page

show_blog.label: Show Latest Blog Posts
show_blog.comment: Shows latest blog posts on the home page

blog_title.label: Title
blog_title.comment: Title for the latest blog posts

ajax_addtocart.label: "Add To Cart" uses AJAX
ajax_addtocart.comment: Turns on AJAX Add To Cart

ajax_wishlist.label: Add to Wishlist And Add to Compare uses AJAX
ajax_wishlist.comment: Turns on AJAX Add To Wishlist and Add To Compare

hover_swap.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_swap.comment: Displays second product image on mouse over. The image is defined by putting "back" label for it in the image options for this product

column_count.label: Grid View Mode
column_count.comment: Can be overriden for each category separately

picture_aspect.label: Product Picture Format
picture_aspect.comment: The aspect ratio of the product picture. Set according to your pictures. Can be overriden for each category separately

product_list_style.label: Product List Style
product_list_style.comment: Boxed style draws a box around every product. Use what fits best.

infinite_scroll.label: Infinite Scroll
infinite_scroll.comment: Enables loading the products from the next page via AJAX in Pinterest style

infinity_scroll_row_count.label: Infinite Scroll Number Of Merged Pages
infinity_scroll_row_count.comment: Put the number of merged pages

layer.label: Shopping Options
layer.comment: The state of the groups in the shopping options (the layered navigation). Opened or closed by default

showgallery.label: Show Additional Images
showgallery.comment: If enabled, this will show all additional images for this product in a small tooltip box

brand_attr.label: Brand Attribute Code
brand_attr.comment: Text string with no spaces. Search for that code in Catalog -> Attributes -> Manage Attributes

brand_link_search_enabled.label: Brand Logo Is A Link To Search Results
brand_link_search_enabled.comment: E.g. Microsoft logo will be a link to catalogsearch/result/?q=microsoft

brand_page_base_path.label: Base Path To Brand's Pages
brand_page_base_path.comment: Path is relative to the store root. No leading or trailing slashes. To use this path disable Brand Logo is a Link to Search Results option. For more details please refer to extension manual

use_zoom.label: Use Cloud Zoom For Product Images

countdown_timer.label: Countdown timer for products on sale

countdown_timer_format.label: Countdown timer format
countdown_timer_format.comment: The format of the time displayed.

size_chart_attribute_identifier.label: Size chart attribute identifier
size_chart_attribute_identifier.comment: If you wish to display link to size chart, enter the attribute identifier here. Empty to disable. More info.

twitter.label: Twitter Widget ID
twitter.comment:
How to get a valid ID: Go to www.twitter.com and sign in as normal, go to your settings page. Go to "Widgets" on the left hand side. Create a new widget for what you need eg "user timeline" or "search" etc. Now go back to settings page, and then go back to widgets page, you should see the widget you just created. Click edit. Now look at the URL in your web browser, you will see a long number like this: 350896567504478208
Use this as your ID!
